name: SingBearDown
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bear down
des: As the Chicago Bears are one of the most iconic and popular teams in NFL history, it only made sense to teach Alexa how to pay homage to the great Chicago Bears. If you prompt her "Alexa, Bear Down" she will continue to sing the fight song through to the end. Join in with her or let her sing solo.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
